content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was negotiating the rental price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price?​ Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, what was the main reason for not agreeing on a price?
name: Evaluator

content: The main reason for not agreeing on a price was that the landlord's price expectations were higher than my offer.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I didn't rate the likeability of the negotiation partner.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang
